resources.string: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
Hogwarts Castle, Highlands, Scotland, Great Britain

Established around the 10th century, Hogwarts is considered to be one of the finest magical institutions in the wizarding world.\n\nThe school\'s motto is Draco Dormiens Nunquam Titillandus, which, translated from Latin, means \"Never tickle a sleeping dragon\".
